name: Spark in the Dark (Pilar Hidalgo Lopez - Philow)
name_original: Spark in the Dark (Pilar Hidalgo Lopez - Philow)
description:
In a world not very different from ours there is an overwhelming darkness, so overwhelming that it dulls the entire light of the world, it is said that in an ancient dungeon there is the necessary power to be able to destroy the darkness, but many heroes left and never returned. Can you go to the dungeon and solve all the mysteries that are found there? ... Good luck hero the world needs your spirit.
